ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
IF(VALUE(LEFT( TEXT(End_Visit_Time__c) , LEN( TEXT(End_Visit_Time__c) )-3 )) < VALUE(LEFT(TEXT(Start_Visit_Time__c), LEN( TEXT(Start_Visit_Time__c) )-3 )), true,
IF( AND(LEFT(TEXT(Start_Visit_Time__c), LEN( TEXT(Start_Visit_Time__c) )-3 )= LEFT( TEXT(End_Visit_Time__c) , LEN( TEXT(End_Visit_Time__c) )-3 ),
AND( RIGHT( TEXT(End_Visit_Time__c) , 2)="00" ,RIGHT( TEXT(Start_Visit_Time__c) , 2)="30") ) , true,
false) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: End Visit Time must not be earlier than Start Visit Time
